Plot: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but doesn't quite understand the concept.
Title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
Writer: Tim Burton (based on: a story and characters by), Michael McDowell (adaptation), Caroline Thompson (screenplay)
Actors: Danny Elfman, Chris Sarandon, Catherine O'Hara, William Hickey
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 7 nominations.
